channel.title: Foolish moments.
channel.description: Just wondering if anyone out there has had any foolish moments they would like to share. I have one. Bought Left 4 Dead GOTY edition for £30 for my laptop and got in to find i could not run the graphics required. Later that day i found out about "Can you run it" and facepalmed. i then had to spend another £30 on it for the xbox and i now keep getting kicked from every server i join. Foolish moment indeed.

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Fungus
item.description:
Opened up my bookmarks and clicked the one called “black mesa”. Have absolutely no idea why I did that, biggest fuck up ever. I’m never going to live that down am I?

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
jeffraven:

It would be easier to believe that both of you have done some embarassing things and have effectively removed any witnesses from verifying that those events occurred.

Want to be added to that number?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: jeffraven
item.description:
Psyborg:

I have never done anything embarrassing and therefore am the only real man here.

baconeggs:

Agreed. I am flawless.

It would be easier to believe that both of you have done some embarassing things and have effectively removed any witnesses from verifying that those events occurred.

Read full topic

Foolish moment indeed.

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: jeffraven
item.description:
I rang up $10k in credit card debt, and $35k in student loans. I’m digging my way out now, but I wish I could go back to my younger self and slap him in the face.

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
happened to me, a GOD-DAMN model for a Photography company was ALL over me, I avoided her like the fuckin’ plague.

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
mattemuse:

I took a beautiful girl out and didn’t make a move. Now she’s pissed that I didn’t make a move, and my chance is gone.

Foolish moment indeed.

Doesn’t that happen to everyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
I misread my work schedule and missed work yesterday.
In my defense, they didn’t bother calling me to inform me of being late/having to work at all yesterday.

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
I inadvertantly set my clock back two hours instead of one last week. I woke up an hour late, and missed my first class.

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I once walked into the wrong classroom at school. It took me way too long to realize they hadn’t just rearranged the furniture while I was in the bathroom.
I also once tried to fit myself into a locker, but failed to notice that there was a padlock on it. They had to use heavy-duty wire cutters to get me out.

I’ve done some very stupid things while off my medicine. :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Jack
item.description:
I set off a Resonance Cascade. Very foolish indeed.

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: func_random
item.description:
I befriended a lonely freshman ‘gunji otaku’
He hasn’t left me alone since and now I can’t use my lunch for last minute homework.
I stay the fuck away from most freshmen now.

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description:
I just knocked over a full (well, now empty) cup of water. Missed my keyboard by about an inch. whew

And by “just”, I mean while this thread was loading.

Read full topic

item.title: Foolish moments.
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
A few years ago, right before I had PE at school I realized I wasn’t wearing any underwear. I said I forgot my stuff, even though I didn’t so I wouldn’t have to change :3

Foolish moment indeed.

Foolish moment indeed.
